email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. Given the current market conditions, the best I can do is $49.75 per metric ton. As for the laycan, we’re looking at October 20-25 for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.75 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. The laycan dates are acceptable. Could you also provide details on demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate and laycan work for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the full charter party agreement for your review shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. Please go ahead and send over the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve just sent the charter party agreement to your email. Please review and let me know if you have any questions. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
